ygData.subject: Re: Macro setup for bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Though is has nothing to do with the macro setup, I ll discuss the friendly gnoll Grenix. He does anything but spawn regularly. He know longer follows the 6
ygData.messageBody:
Though is has nothing to do with the macro setup, I'll discuss the
friendly gnoll Grenix. He does anything but spawn regularly. He know
longer follows the 6 hour schedule, and at times he won't spawn for 12
or so hours, and then 3 times the next hour. I've sat around, watch many
fights(lost too many of them to nukers and high level people), and I can
safely say there is no pattern. Even the captain formula(don't ask)
doesn't work anymore. Getting one of these is pure luck. And yes, it is
strange they spawn there. Too bad the captain is blind heh...

Talonus
Traveling Bard of Solusek Ro


> Quick question: Someone mentioned the named fellow in highpass spawns
> regularly... what times may this be, if you please? I really want me one of
> those Tomahwaks but I've spent so much time just sitting around watching
> tons of very organized people take care of that chunk of the zone that I
> feel I need to resort to more inquisitive methods. Nobody there's willing
> to join me in conversation.
> As an aside: Don't you think it odd that so many gnolls spawn right near
> where a captain hangs out and around the corner from a bustling city? Sort
> of like coyotes in NYC.
>
> Dud.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> "Congratulations to 'Voice-Diary,' our latest ONElist of the Week.
